sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag' export default class MDXContent extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.layout = null } render() { const { components, ...props } = this.props return {`Accessing REflex`} {`You'll need your REflex API key to complete this walkthrough. REflex access is restricted to HSF technology partner program members. `} {`To inquire about joining our partner program, please contact `}{`Michael Fortes`} {`Setup`} {`Configure your environment`} {`Add the following environment variables to your bash profile for local development and/or your .env or Dockerfile for production.`} {`export REFLEX_API_KEY=... export REFLEX_APP_NAME=... export INBOX=https://\${REFLEX_APP_NAME}.ds.bhhsresource.com/inbox/ `} {`Install HTTPie CLI (optional)`} {`Shell examples require the HTTPie CLI. Installation instructions can be found on `}{`httpie.org`}{`.`}
Note: If you can't or prefer not to install HTTPie, you can use Postman or CURL.
{`Send & Receive Messages`} {`Create an inbox`} {`You can create an inbox for your application by HTTP GET to a new inbox with your API key in the request header.`} {`Note: this first request may take up to 1 minute to return a response while your inbox is created.`} {`http -v \$INBOX x-api-key:\$REFLEX_API_KEY `} {`RESPONSE`} {`GET /inbox/ HTTP/1.1 Accept: */* Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate Connection: keep-alive Host: \${REFLEX_APP_NAME}.ds.bhhsresource.com User-Agent: HTTPie/0.9.9 x-api-key: xxxxx HTTP/1.1 200 Connection: keep-alive Content-Length: 64 Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8 Date: Mon, 10 Sep 2018 05:20:19 GMT X-Request-Id: 8bc56b7f-9733-4a7c-a02e-4cf746e7c9f9 { "contains": [], "id": "https://\${REFLEX_APP_NAME}.ds.bhhsresource.com/inbox/" } `} {`Send a message`} {`Publish inbox messages with HTTP POST.`} {`http -v POST \$INBOX x-api-key:\$REFLEX_API_KEY foo=bar `} {`RESPONSE`} {`POST /inbox/ HTTP/1.1 Accept: application/json, */* Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate Connection: keep-alive Content-Length: 14 Content-Type: application/json Host: dave.ds.bhhsresource.com User-Agent: HTTPie/0.9.9 x-api-key: xxxxxxxx { "foo": "bar" } HTTP/1.1 200 Connection: keep-alive Content-Length: 2 Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8 Date: Wed, 12 Sep 2018 13:40:16 GMT X-Request-Id: 2b0deb2e-6405-428d-a1c4-64004e03d922 {} `} {`Get messages`} {`To retrieve inbox messages, HTTP GET the inbox URL`} {`note: the trailing slash on inbox/ is significant`} {`http -v GET \$INBOX x-api-key:\$REFLEX_API_KEY `} {`RESPONSE`} {`{ "id": "https://example.com/inbox/", "contains": [ { "id": "https://example.com/inbox/message-id", "type": "Notification", "timestamp": 1536555268275, "instrument": "https://yodata.io/vendor/app", "target": "https://example.com/inbox/", "object": { "foo": "bar" } } ] } `} } }
